tour.title: Tutorial
tour.welcome_text_2: With this app you can design exciting tours of all kinds. We'll show you how here.
tour.description:
With this app you can A PinGo is a collection of locations that are related in terms of content. For example, create a travel guide with a collection of city highlights.

Or design a scavenger hunt through nature for your friends. Design exciting tours of all kinds. We'll show you how here.
tour.navigation_text:
On the Homepage you can see all currently available PinGos in your area.

In the Profile at the top right, you can create an account. Then it's yours possible to create your own PinGos.
tour.stations_text:
A PinGo consists of several locations. You can add new Stations at any time.

You can either create a location by entering coordinates directly, or you can move the PIN directly on the map < b>with your finger.
tour.visibility_text:
Set the visibility to private and then share your PinGo via a link, QR code or directly with a user .

Or you can set the visibility to public and share your tours with the whole world!
tour.treasure_hunt:
In a treasure hunt, the order of the stations is important. You can arrange them using drag and drop.

Then you can think of another question. The station will then only become visible once the correct answer is entered.
tour.creativity_text:
Your creativity has no limits.
Let's go!
tour.step_1: Here you can access all important functions.
tour.step_2: By clicking on the logo, you can see all PinGos near you.
tour.step_welcome: With a click, you can return to the introduction.
tour.step_qr: Open an existing PinGo by scanning a QR code.
tour.step_profile_create: Here, you can create and manage your own PinGos at any time.
